865450.name: SCORCHED EARTH
865450.description:
SCORCHED EARTH is a chunky PS2 mecha-action game with massive amounts of customization, where you play as a mercenary taking on dirty jobs across a planetary war.

SCORCHED EARTH is currently in development, and devlog videos can be found on YouTube.

Overwhelming Variety!

Your mech is highly customizable, with 22 slots to tweak and refine your personal war machine! The game currently has 125 parts, with more always cookin'!

Play As An Elite Pilot Amid A Planetary War!

After Earth became too super-heated and stripped of resources, no longer able to support life, humanity took to the stars and arrived at the only candidate planet they could find - Argos! Mega-corporations, and the rich & powerful, rushed to get there first and capitalize on resources. Each day, you pick which faction to support by taking one of their missions and helping their plans come to fruition. That decision will influence not only the balance of power, but also what decisions they make next! Every corporation and anti-corpo faction has a cast of characters constantly making plans & scheming, and reacting to those around them. You might wish to be a paragon of virtue, but when every bullet costs money to shoot, and every point of damage costs money to repair, hard decisions will have to be made...
